Placebase Tiles
MQA.PlaceBaseTileConstructs a MQA.PlaceBaseTile object.

getUrlFunction to build the url specific to the tile based on the lat/lng of the center point of the tile.

MQA.PlaceBaseTile

Constructs a MQA.PlaceBaseTile object.  The MQA.PlaceBaseTile is a javascript class that represents a tile object which uses data from PlaceBase while creating a custom tile layer.  This is a parameter that is getting passed to the TileLayer obj and from there to the tile object.  This can be used at the time of creation of tile specific urls.

Parameters

parent(object) A Browser DIV HTML element to be the map’s container.
left(int) The left style property for the tile image
top(int) The top style property for the tile image
x(int) Represents the column number to which the tile belongs to
y(int) Represents the Row number to which the tile belongs to
scale(int) The current scale of the map
zoom(int) The current zoom of the map
size(int) The Tile size in pixels asuming that tile width is same as tile height
url(int) The url template for accessing a specific tile
opacity(int) The opacity of the tile image
options(object) The optional parameters that can be passed at the time of adding a custom tile layer.  This should be in JSON format eg: { key:A7FAE33F57B75DD9B9CF887526783BFE, layers:”base,poly,pointline,cities” }.

Functions

getUrl

Function to build the url specific to the tile based on the lat/lng of the center point of the tile.  Returns an image URL.

Parameters

none

Returns

string
